title: [Large-scale] Foundations of Structural Reliability Design for Manned Submersible Pressure Chambers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering mechanics and materials science knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based digital materials with in-person practical sessions. Operates a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of pressure chambers that respond to high-pressure conditions in deep-sea environments
Learners can apply structural reliability assessment methods using neural networks and optimization algorithms
Learners can understand the pressure-resistant design process through geometric parameter optimization of spherical structures

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
